Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » DSS M2M Interface API

DSS M2M input pipe parameters. More...

#include <vps_m2mDss.h>

Detailed Description

DSS M2M input pipe parameters.

Field Documentation

Vps_DssDispcGfxConfig Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::gfxCfg

Graphics Configuration structure, applicable only for Graphics pipeline instances. Leave it to default values for video pipeline

Fvid2_Format Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::inFmt

Input FVID frame format.

width:
Input width, in pixels. This represents the input width in memory.

height:
Input height, in lines. This represents the input height in memory.

dataFormat:
Input Data format, valid options for TDA3XX are
FVID2_DF_BGR16_565,
FVID2_DF_RGB16_565,
FVID2_DF_BGR24_888,
FVID2_DF_YUV420SP_UV,
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_YUYV,
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_UYVY.

Input Data format, valid options for TDA2XX/TDA2EX are
FVID2_DF_BGR16_565,
FVID2_DF_BGR24_888,
FVID2_DF_YUV420SP_UV,
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_UYVY,
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_YUYV,
For valid values see Fvid2_DataFormat.

pitch:
Pitch in bytes between two lines. And should be aligned to VPS_BUFFER_ALIGNMENT.

fieldMerged, chNum, scanFormat, bpp: Not used, set to 0 or default.

UInt32 Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::inPipeId

Input pipeline ID to which this parameter applies.

For valid values see Vps_DssDispcPipes. Note: WB nodes out of Vps_DssDispcPipes should not be used

UInt32 Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::memType

Memory type. For valid values see Vps_VpdmaMemoryType. Note: Tiler Memory is not supported as of now, user should set this to VPS_VPDMA_MT_NONTILEDMEM.

Vps_DssDispcOvlyPipeConfig Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::ovlyPipeCfg

Overlay configuration per pipe, applicable only when WB is through overlay.

UInt32 Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::posX

X position of the frame in the output window when overlay is used.

UInt32 Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::posY

Y position of the frame in the output window when overlay is used.

UInt32 Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::tarHeight

Verticle Size of picture at output of video pipeline Not used in case of Graphics instance.

UInt32 Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::tarWidth

Horizontal Size of picture at output of video pipeline Not used in case of Graphics instance.

Vps_DssDispcVidConfig Vps_M2mDssInPipeParams::vidCfg

Video Configuration structure, applicable only for Video pipeline instances. Leave it to default values for graphics pipeline
